title: (x) University of Oregon Ducks wide techno sans - (similar to) Domyouji {Arun}
content:
Can anyone help ID this font? Thanks in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100609110440im_/http:/typophile.com/files/oregon_6659.JPG)
author: mcintire

comments.content:
Perhaps it was based on Handel Gothic.

- Lex
Could also be based on [Domyouji](http://web.archive.org/web/20100609110440/http:/www.typodermic.com/125.html), with a lower case 'n'.
